item.title: Gentle Guide to Love-in-a-Mist Varieties
item.description:
Gentle Guide to Love-in-a-Mist Varieties: A Whisper of Lace and Light

In the quiet moments of my garden, Love-in-a-Mist (Nigella damascena) feels like a secret whispered through delicate laceâ€”the intricate filigree of its foliage shielding the fragile blooms like a protective veil. These flowers embody a tender resilience, a softness that is not fragile but fiercely protective, much like the gentle strength many women nurture within themselves on their path of growth and healing.
